elements.label: 蜕衣俱乐部
elements.description: A cabaret with an occult reputation. The club has several layers of stages, each with more exclusive than the previous, and each one more intimate. I can enter on Agdistis' invitation, but I am not permitted true access until I have proven myself in an audition.

slots.label: Song
slots.description: I should begin my performance, by declaring my intentions, my method, my staging.

slots.label: 以轶事交换
slots.description: 只要让他们愿意分享自己的故事，我愿意分享自己的。
